attributes.action: Change the way mothers prevent fathers from seeing their children.
attributes.additional_details:
The system currently allows mothers to prevent fathers access to children without a given reason or explanation.

This is currently happening to a close friend of mine, who is a decent father, who just wants to spend quality time with his children.  

I am disgusted the system allows this to happen, not only is it detrimental to the children, but absolutely unfair on the father, who just wants to be a parent to his children.
attributes.background: I would like to see the Government review the current system which allows mothers to refuse fathers access to their children for no valid reason or with no reasonable explanation.
